full_text: Note: This is two patterns combined in one document to raise money for the Movember Prostate Cancer event via Stitch London . You can download them from their pattern pages here: Finger Tash by Megan Death Daley Thompson Tash by Laura Davis Who in the world does not admire a fine bristling bit of face fur? The moustache has been wooing women (and men), winning hearts, and being twirled in a dastardly manner since the dawn of time. We know you’d love your very own moustache but who has time time (or the hormones) to grow one in today’s busy climate? Fear not that is these fine Tashtastic Knit Moustaches come in. Hurrah for the tash! For a small or large donation you can download these three fine face fur patterns and start getting your tash on right away. All you need to do is donate to Prostate UK and the moustache patterns are yours. Any sum will do (we recommend a minimum of £2). Just CLICK HERE to go to the donations page and give as much as you can. CLICK HERE to download the Stitch London Tashtastic Knit Crawl 2009 Moustache Patterns as one PDF. Or go to the individual pattern pages here: Finger Tash by Megan Death Daley Thompson Tash by Laura Davis Now find yourself a quiet corner and start creating your tash. To see more about the Stitch London Knit Crawl if you click here . All designers have kindly given permission for these patterns to be used to raise money for charity.
name: Ravelry: S&B London Tashtastic Moustache Patterns pattern by Megan Death and Laura Davis
